e="preserve">Alan Harrison Berg (January 1, 1934 – June 18, 1984) was an American Jewish attorney and talk radio show host in Denver, Colorado. He was born in Chicago, Illinois. Berg was known for his mostly liberal views. His programs could be received in more than 30 states. He was lastly hired by KOA and debuted on February 23, 1981. He worked at KOA until his death.
On June 18, 1984, Berg was fatally shot, aged 50, in the driveway of his Denver home by members of the white nationalist group.
